content.rendered:
Military TA is welcomed as a form of payment for tuition charges.  TA generally covers tuition but does not cover additional fees such as Registration fee, Appeals fee or Graduation application fee. For a full outline of Tuition charges and fees, please visit: https://laverne.edu/tuiti on/military/ 

Steps to using Military Tuition Assistance at La Verne:

  1.  Apply for and be approved to use TA benefits via your branch’s Virtual Education Services Center
  2. Apply for and receive admission to the University of La Verne. An admission counselor will be assigned to walk you through each step.
  3. Receive Academic Advising and Enroll into approved courses.
  4. Request a TA payment voucher from your branch’s Education Service Center.
  5. Submit your approved TA payment voucher to La Verne, using our (TA) Voucher Submission form.

Before you apply, be sure to determine if La Verne is the best fit for your goals & needs:

  • Visit the GI Bill Comparison Tool
  • Visit ‘ DoD – TA Decide ‘
  • Visit ‘Career Path Decide ‘
  • Contact your branch’s ESC for educati on program guidance

To apply for Military Tuition Assistance, refer to your command Education office or Online resource:

  • Navy (https://www.navycollege.navy.mil/sailors/tuition-assistance-ncpace.htm
  • USAF/ USSF  https://afvec.us.af.mil/afvec/public/welcome
  • ARMY /Guard: https://myarmybenefits.us.army.mil/Benefit-Library/Federal-Benefits/Tuition-Assistance-(TA)

 

Military Tuition Assistance (TA) Refund Policy

The Department of Defense memorandum of understanding requires that the university “have an institutional policy that returns any unearned Tuition Assistance (TA) funds on a proportional basis through at least the 60 percent portion of the period for which the funds were provided. TA funds are earned proportionally during an enrollment period, with unearned funds returned based upon when a student stops attending.” 

University Refund/Tuition Credit Policies can be viewed in full, at: https://laverne.edu/accounts/refund-tuition-credit-policies/

 

ULV’s Online Military Tuition Assistance Authorization (TA) Voucher Submission

Submit your Request for Active Duty T.A. Authorization & Voucher for each semester/term you plan to use T.A. You must be admitted to a degree program and be enrolled in classes prior to submitting a TA voucher using this form.

Tuition Assistance & “Top Up” 

Active-Duty students can utilize their Montgomery GI Bill Active Duty or Post 9/11 GI Bill to pay tuition in any Session or Semester. This process is referred to as “Top-Up”.  Top-up is best used when you have exhausted Armed Forces (TA) funding for the fiscal year, and you do not have an alternate funding source (such as grants & loans via FAFSA).  You must determine your eligibility for this benefit with the VA. Students using ‘Top Up’ will submit a VA Enrollment Certification Request form in lieu of an approved TA voucher.
